content: >**get 20 % off when you buy 3 patterns no coupon needed** this dishtowel pattern was created as a matching kitchen towel to go with my lemon dishcloth pattern > subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be notified when new patterns come out pattern info stitches used in this pattern single_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet finished size of the dishtowel 18 inches long x 13 inches wide yarn used ~ 200 yards of cotton medium weight 4 yarn for color 1 ~ 30 yards of another cotton medium weight 4 yarn for color 2 you do not need to use two colors for the pattern one will work too you will need around 230 yards if using one color any cotton medium worsted weight yarn will do lion brand pima cotton and loops & thread capri eco cotton were used to make models of this towel a video tutorial is available for this pattern https //youtu be/jpuopx-nomc 1 https //subscribepage io/mfhzxe
